tool.name: Remove spurious

param.label: Threshold for spurious event removal.
param.name: threshold
param.help: Remove all crosslinking events that combine less reads than this fraction of the maximum number of reads at this position (--threshold).

tool.help:
bctools - Remove spurious events originating from errors in random sequence tags ================================================================================
This tool compares all events sharing the same coordinates. Among each group of events the maximum number of PCR duplicates is determined. By default, all events that are supported by less than 10 percent of this maximum count are removed.
Input -----
* BED6 containing crosslinking events with score field set to number of PCR duplicates
Output ------
* BED6 with spurious crosslinking events removed, sorted by fields chrom, start, stop, strand
